hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT c FROM City c WHERE c.status = :status
SELECT d FROM District d WHERE d.status = :status AND d.cityId = :cityId
SELECT w FROM Ward w WHERE w.status = :status AND w.districtId = :districtId AND w.cityId = :cityId
SELECT s FROM Street s WHERE s.status = :status AND s.districtId = :districtId AND s.cityId = :cityId
SELECT l FROM LandType l WHERE l.status = :status
SELECT h FROM HousingType h WHERE h.status = :status ORDER BY h.order
SELECT h FROM BalconyDirection h WHERE h.status = :status
